content.rendered:
At Vmaxinfo Institutewe provide 100% placement assistance for our students. We have worked for many I.T. and other companies in puneand places like Mumbai, Pune, Banglore, Hydrabad etc. We have good relation and continuous contact with these company. Any opening with these company get continuously share with our company and we forward these opening to our students who are looking for job in similar field.

We are in touch with more than 250 companies in Maharashtra for their requirement of recruitment. We also have placement service division which work for different I.T. companies. We are able to place most of the students within short period after completion of course.

Candidate looking for job are requested to send their resume at info@itechnasik.com and hr@itechplacement.com
